name: The Maze Remixed
description:
The Maze Remixed The Maze is back!

The classic 2004 game designed to test your hand skills is back!

Use the mouse to control the blue dot through the mazes to the red goal without touching any walls!

All the classic mazes plus new, more difficult mazes have been mixed together to create a unique experience for each playthrough!

Can you get to the final 6th level?

Original game by Jeremy Winterrowd

This game includes sudden loud noises with unsettling imagery.
